alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Calhoun; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 3:35PM CDT until July 16 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Bradley County in southeastern Arkansas... Southern Calhoun County in southwestern Arkansas... Southern Ouachita County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 335 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Stephens to near Bernice, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hampton... Stephens... Calion... Louann... Moro Bay State Park... Moro Bay... Hampton Municipal Airport... Artesian... Delhi... Kirkland... Millers Bluff... Frenchport... Elliot... Cross Roads in Ouachita County... Locust Bayou... Standard Umpstead... Buena Vista... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
